feed.title: This Is Now a Whiskey Podcast
feed.subtitle: Long format interviews of people in the tech community where we dive deep into their career paths, what they do day to day, and try to show that there are so many different career paths for IT.

entry.title: #000 - Chandler Bassett - Product Overlay
entry.summary: Tonight we interview Chandler Bassett, who is a Product Overlay for Pure Storage. We dive into his career path leading to where he is today, including his time in the military.
